fields_of_interest: Trade, Education and training, Business and Industry, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Transport
eu_initiatives: We plan on monitoring initiatives and policies related to or affecting the maritime industry.
organisation_name: Society of Naval Architects and Marine Engineers (SNAME)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: In the future, SNAME plans on organizing events and forums dealing with EU policies and inviting Commissioners, MEP's and their assistants or EU officials.
goals__remit:
The mission of the Society is to advance the art, science and practice of naval architecture, marine engineering, ocean engineering and other marine-related professions through: 
 
The global exchange of knowledge and ideas relative to the marine industry. 
 
Encouraging and sponsoring research and development in naval architecture, marine engineering, ocean engineering and other marine fields.
